text: random alley murals here breathe life into old walls - hidden art gems everywhere
always get drawn to those quirky side street murals here; you turn a corner and bam! color explosion right where you least expect it - feels super homey every time
oh yeah gotta love how even small things like our old clock tower can be so cool too gives off those realistic castle vibes every time you look up
realized i was an adult when balancing art gigs with everyday expenses became real – making a living off creativity's no small feat here!
continuously grinding away at any job ain’t magic for sparking creativity - sometimes less is more when you need your imagination tank refuelled
definitely see more women in art these days but don’t get fooled thinking all's fine now - biases sneak up even where you least expect 'em.
sure more gals painting but clients still prefer guys 🙄

not sure i buy into the whole "hometown imprints resilience" thing - some of us had to develop that despite our surroundings rather than because of them... makes for interesting character development though, doesn’t it?
not just windy streets toughen you up - trying to make ends meet here doing art gets real gritty, forges some serious metal too 🔨😬
